alert.note: Alert for Central Siskiyou County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 21 at 10:30PM PST until December 23 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM WEDNESDAY TO 1 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts 45 to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of both Interstate 5 and Highway 97 in and near the town of Weed in Central Siskiyou County. * WHEN...From 1 PM Wednesday to 1 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Steering could become difficult, at times, due to wind gusts, especially for high profile vehicles. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
